newsitem.title: UK: Up to 20 trapped after UK train crash.
newsitem.headline: Up to 20 trapped after UK train crash.

text.p: Up to 20 people were trapped on Tuesday when a freight train derailed near London, fire brigade officials said.
They were trapped when railway arches converted into factory units collapsed beneath the train, they said.
Six fire engines and 40 firefighters rushed to the crash scene at Bexley in the southern English county of Kent.
Rescue workers said the area was cordoned off and one of the wagons on the freight train was said to be dangling precariously over the edge of the elevated track.
They were searching for up to 20 people that may have been trapped in the six workshops underneath the arches.
